abstract: The price is said to be $39 million for the app that competes with Pandora and others in making customized playlists of recommended songs.
snippet: The price is said to be $39 million for the app that competes with Pandora and others in making customized playlists of recommended songs.
lead_paragraph: In a sign of growing consolidation in the digital music business, Google announced on Tuesday that it had bought Songza, a three-year-old app that competes with Pandora and others in making customized playlists of recommended songs.

headline.main: Google in Deal for Songza, a Music Playlist Service
headline.print_headline: Google in Deal for Songza, a Music Playlist Service
